attributes.action: use your influence to bring about the removal of Michael Martin as Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Martin has consistently abused his position as speaker. He has shown a remarkable degree of incompetance in his dealings in the House, his financial dealings leave much to be desired, he is not trusted by many; and this latest episode involving the search of Mr Green's private House of Commons office and files comes as no surprise. Nor does it that he tried to firmly put the blame for this on his staff instead of taking responsibility himself. He must go.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
